alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 27 at 11:57PM CDT until March 28 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Chambers County in southeastern Texas... East central Harris County in southeastern Texas... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1156 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Morgan`s Point, or near Baytown, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 1153 PM, quarter to half dollar size hail was reported in Baytown . IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Baytown, La Porte, Deer Park, Beach City, southeastern Mont Belvieu, Shoreacres, Cove, Morgan`s Point and San Jacinto State Park. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
